text: "Missing Words" is a song and single written by Neol Davies and performed by British ska group, The Selecter. Released in 1980 it reached #23, on the UK charts, staying there for eight weeks. ==Background== In contrast to The Selecter's two previous singles, "On My Radio" and "Three Minute Hero", "Missing Words" is a downbeat song about heartbreak issued as the 2 Tone Records ska revival began to fade. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 singles Category:1980 songs Category:The Selecter songs Category:2 Tone Records singles Category:Songs written by Neol Davies
title: Missing Words
